info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 9:36PM EST until December 15 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Martin, Saint Lucie, Indian River, Brevard and coastal Volusia counties. The strongest wind gusts will occur on the barrier islands and coastal communities. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around lightweight, unsecured objects, such as holiday decorations. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
